Constructor Detail

Torus

public Torus(processing.core.PGraphics i_g,
             int i_phiSteps,
             int i_thetaSteps)
Parameters:
i_g - A PGraphics object where the surface should be drawn in. Mostly this is g, the current PGraphics object of your sketch.
i_phiSteps - The horizontal resolution of the surface.
i_thetaSteps - The vertical resolution of the surface.

Torus

public Torus(processing.core.PGraphics i_g,
             int i_phiSteps,
             int i_thetaSteps,
             int[][] i_colors)
Parameters:
i_colors - An array which holds the colors for the vertical and horizontal gradient ([[[verticalColor1],[verticalColor2],...],[[horizontalColor1],[horizontalColor2]]]). You can also use [[[verticalColor1],[verticalColor2],...],null]) to get only an vertical gradient. Note that the the color stuff only work in the OPENGL mode.

Torus

public Torus(processing.core.PGraphics i_g,
             int i_phiSteps,
             int i_thetaSteps,
             float i_innerRadius,
             float i_outerRadius)
Parameters:
i_innerRadius - The length between the middlepoint and the middle of the torus. Note this value should be greater than the outerRadius to have a hole in the torrus. The default value is 3.
i_outerRadius - The length between middle and the end of the torus. Note this value should be smaller than the innerRadius to have a hole in the torrus. The default value is 1.

Returns:
the inner Radius of the torus

outerRadius

public float outerRadius()
Returns:
the outerRadius of the Torus

setInnerRadius

public void setInnerRadius(float i_innerRadius)
Use this to set the innerRadius of the torus.

Parameters:
i_innerRadius - The length between the center and the middle of the torus. Note this value should be greater than the outerRadius to have a hole in the torus.

setOuterRadius

public void setOuterRadius(float i_outerRadius)
Use this to set the outerRadius of the torus.

Parameters:
i_outerRadius - The length between center and the end of the torus. Note this value should be smaller than the innerRadius to have a hole in the torus.

setRadius

public void setRadius(float i_innerRadius,
                      float i_outerRadius)
Use this to set the inner and outer radius of the torus.

Parameters:
i_innerRadius - The length between the center and the middle of the torus. Note this value should be greater than the outerRadius to have a hole in the torus.
i_outerRadius - The length between middle and the end of the torus. Note this value should be smaller than the innerRadius to have a hole in the torus.
